concept.title: Release notes
concept.shortdesc: Release notes for the 2.0 version of the PHP SDK.

concept.title: Version 2.0.7 (22 April 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.7 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: PCBC-339: Add support for using N1QL with CB Server 4.0.0.
PCBC-343: Added missing touch method to CouchbaseBucket.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.6 (7 April 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.6 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: PCBC-331: CouchbaseBucketManager now has a flush operation to clear a bucket.
Orphan: Minor fix to view management return values.
Orphan: ViewQuery::group_level now can be chained as expected.
PCBC-334: PHP 5.4 transcoder compatibility issues have been fixed.
PHP 5.3 support has been deprecated and PHP 5.6 is now fully supported.
Corrected various memory leaks and segfaults.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.5 (3 March 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.5 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: Orphan: Corrected issue where durability checking may not propagate errors.
PCBC-327: group_level semantics now support Couchbase Server 3.x.
Orphan: Corrected issue with some ViewQuery methods.
PCBC-326: Zero-length strings no longer decode as NULL.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.4 (3 February 2015)
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.4 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: PCBC-321: Corrected an issue when passing an incorrect option parameter type.
Corrected an issue related to setting timeouts.
PCBC-317: Updated N1QL querying to support the N1QL DP4 release.
Fixed an issue with design-document management methods.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.3
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.3 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: PCBC-318: Fix append/prepend operations failing on new libcouchbase.
PCBC-319: Correct segfault when using persist_to/replicate_to.
Corrected typo in N1QL query interface.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.2
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.2 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: PCBC-310: Corrected a segmentation fault occurring in some cases when running under Apache or IIS.
Updated PHP script executer to provide accurate error information in Exception stack traces.
Refactored code base for better maintainability.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.1
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.1 is a minor patch update to the 2.0 SDK.

ul.li: Allow JSON decoding as associative array.
Added missing append/prepend forwarders.
Fixed various issues with query creation and execution.
Corrected various build issues.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0.0
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0.0 is the first GA version of the 2.0.0 client.

ul.li: No changes since Beta 2.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0 Beta 2
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0 Beta 2 is the second beta release of the PHP SDK version 2.0.

ul.li: Added support for cross-SDK data storage and retrieval.
Added method to debug generated view queries.
Fixed numerous minor bugs since beta.
None

concept.title: Version 2.0 Beta
concept.shortdesc: Version 2.0 Beta is the first beta release of the PHP SDK version 2.0.

ul.li: This release includes new documentation, new API reference, and an interface representing all committed features. Various uncommitted and experimental features might change prior to the general availability (GA) release of 2.0.0.
None
